news.title: Lies, damned lies and AI: the newest way to influence elections may be here to stay
news.summary: The use of AI-generated campaign videos – labeled or unlabeled – is likely to permeate future US elections. Andrew Cuomo, who lost to Zohran Mamdani, took particular interest in sharing deepfake videos of his opponent.

news.title: EU investigates Google over ‘demotion’ of commercial content from news media
news.summary: The EU has opened an investigation into Google Search over concerns the US tech company has been ‘demoting’ commercial content from news media sites. Some content created with advertisers is no longer visible, which could mean loss of revenue, officials say.
